column1: This royal pair had one only child
column5: was a paragon in the courtiers' eyes
column7: and in her own. It was said she had the longest hair
column11: and the most lovely complexion of any young lady in the Paflagonian dominions. Her accomplishments were announced to be even superior to her beauty; and governesses used to shame their idle pupils by telling them what Princess Angelica could do. She could play the most difficult pieces of music at sight. She could answer any one of "Mangnall's Questions." She knew every date in the history of Paflagonia
column12: and every other country. She knew French
column23: and Crim Tartar. In a word
column24: she was a most accomplished young creature; and her governess and lady-in-waiting was the severe Countess Gruffanuff.
